author: Michael Seidlinger
title: Parasite’s ending makes it one of the all-time great lonely movies
description: With Bong Joon-ho’s Oscar-winner Parasite now streaming exclusively on Hulu, it’s worth looking back at the film’s wrenching ending, which doesn’t fall into the simple categories of “happy” or “sad.” It’s much more of a lonely ending, which makes it perfect f…
content: When Bong Joon-hos Parasitemade Oscar history as the first non-English language film to win Best Picture, it felt like a victory for the cinephiles who made the film a critical darling and a surprise arthouse hit. After a long theatrical run that built extens… [+5851 chars]
